message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really appreciate.  I'm asking for $200 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $175, but I can't go any lower than that.  Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe I can only offer $160 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
